verses.text: \w A|strong="H3588"\w* canticle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H3588"\w* David himself.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w is|strong="H0834"\w* ready, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w is|strong="H0834"\w* ready: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give praise, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* glory.
Arise, my glory; arise, psaltery \w and|strong="H0776"\w* harp: \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* arise \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* morning early.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* praise thee, O Lord, \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing unto thee \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* populations.

\w For|strong="H5315"\w* thy mercy \w is|strong="H1571"\w* great above \w the|strong="H1571"\w* heavens: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* thy truth \w even|strong="H1571"\w* unto \w the|strong="H1571"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* thou exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w above|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy glory \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* earth:
\w That|strong="H1870"\w* thy beloved may \w be|strong="H1870"\w* delivered. Save \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w right|strong="H3477"\w* hand \w and|strong="H1870"\w* hear \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w God|strong="H3068"\w* hath spoken \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holiness. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* divide Sichem \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* mete out \w the|strong="H3068"\w* vale \w of|strong="H1121"\w* tabernacles.

Galaad \w is|strong="H5315"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* Manasses \w is|strong="H5315"\w* mine \w and|strong="H5315"\w* Ephraim \w the|strong="H3588"\w* protection \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* head. Juda \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* king:

Moab \w the|strong="H3427"\w* pot \w of|strong="H3427"\w* my hope. Over Edom I \w will|strong="H2822"\w* stretch \w out|strong="H3427"\w* my shoe: \w the|strong="H3427"\w* aliens \w are|strong="H1270"\w* become my friends.

\w Who|strong="H0410"\w* \w will|strong="H0410"\w* bring \w me|strong="H5006"\w* into \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H0410"\w* city? \w who|strong="H0410"\w* \w will|strong="H0410"\w* lead \w me|strong="H5006"\w* into Edom?

Wilt \w not|strong="H0369"\w* thou, O \w God|strong="H0369"\w*, \w who|strong="H0369"\w* hast \w cast|strong="H3782"\w* us off? \w and|strong="H3820"\w* wilt \w not|strong="H0369"\w* thou, O \w God|strong="H0369"\w*, go forth \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H0369"\w* armies?

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* grant \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w help|strong="H3467"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w trouble|strong="H3467"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* vain \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w help|strong="H3467"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* man.

\w Through|strong="H3318"\w* God we shall \w do|strong="H3318"\w* mightily: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w will|strong="H2822"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H3318"\w* enemies \w to|strong="H3318"\w* nothing.
